title: S12 Ep235: How To Hunt A Devil
itunes:title: How To Hunt A Devil
description:
In This Throwback Thursday episode of Beyond The Darkness from December 17, 2006, we visit with Demonologist Adam Blai who talks about his experiences in fighting evil on the other side. In the second half of the program, we talk with paranormal investigator Patrick Burns about his tv show, Haunting Evidence, a show ahead of it's time that combined true crime investigation with psychic detectives!
